level.text: This chapter shall apply to athlete agents as defined in this chapter and D.C. Official Code §§ 47-2887 et seq. (2002 Supp.).
Authority: The Uniform Athlete Agents Act of 2002, effective April 13, 2002 (D.C. Law 14-107; D.C. Official Code §§ 47-2887 et seq. (2002 Supp.)) and Mayor’s Order 2003-61, dated May 16, 2003.
